meanings.definition: Feeling or showing satisfaction or contentment.
meanings.sent1: She was pleased with her drawing.
meanings.sent2: The children were pleased with their new toys.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked pleased after catching the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden seemed pleased with the rain.
meanings.sent5: The warm sun made her feel pleased and happy.

meanings.definition: To give pleasure or satisfaction to.
meanings.sent1: He pleased his grandmother by baking cookies for her.
meanings.sent2: The music pleased the crowd and made them dance.
meanings.sent3: The magician pleased the audience with his tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughtful gift pleased her friend immensely.
meanings.sent5: The delicious cake pleased everyone at the party.
